column3: Django Admin safely handles the 'next' parameter (False Positive).
Server headers are standard in CI/Docker; Nginx handles this on Prod.
Cache headers on login/static files are handled correctly by Django/Whitenoise.
CSP is configured via middleware; ZAP strictness on static files/fallbacks is excessive here.
Permissions Policy is added via middleware; ignoring static file misses.
CORS on static files in Dev/CI environment is expected behavior.
COEP disabled to allow loading external images.
